command of `mpython3`
```bash
env JAVA_HOME=/opt/homebrew/Cellar/openjdk/18.0.2 PYTHONPATH=$(python3 -c "import sys; print(':'.join(sys.path))"):/opt/homebrew/lib/python3.10/site-packages python3 $@
```
